data.title: In-Person, Hybrid, & Virtual Event Technology
data.meta_description: Webex Events (formerly Socio) is the all-in-one event management platform to host unforgettable in-person, hybrid, and virtual events.
data.text:
Intuitive technology for seamless event experiences.

Webex Events provides everything you need to raise the bar for your events, whether your audience is joining in-person or virtually.

Mobile Event App

Allow your attendees to access your event content in-person or on the go from a simple and fully-customizable mobile event app.

Explore the Mobile Event App

Virtual Event Platform

Host more engaging, interactive virtual events that attendees love. The Webex Events virtual event platform comes standard with all the networking and engagement features you need to ensure active virtual participation and to drive better results.

Explore the Virtual Event Platform

Explore solutions to power event success

Webex Events blends flexibility with ease of use so organizers can host engaging events that support their goals, no matter the type of event or organization. We have solutions for:

Any Event Type

From interactive internal events to conferences of up to 100,000 attendees, Webex Events has the flexibility to bring your event to life. Learn about common event types hosted on Webex Events:

Conferences

Trade Shows

Internal Events

Any Organization

Whether you’re an association or Fortune 100 company, Webex Events is all you need to host engaging events. We serve dozens of industries, including:

Enterprise

Associations

Higher Education

Any Event Format

Does your event management platform give you peace of mind and flexibility? Use a single platform for all of your events – whether virtual, in-person, hybrid, or event communities.

Virtual

Hybrid

In-Person
